summary.title: SUMMARY
summary.text: Experienced Full-stack Developer with {{years}} years of professional experience in building scalable web applications using Node.js, React, and TypeScript. Proficient in both front-end and back-end development, with expertise in RESTful APIs, database design, and modern development frameworks. Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for creating efficient, maintainable code that delivers exceptional user experiences.

tattoo.name: Tattoo Studio Platform
tattoo.tech: NestJS, Prisma, GraphQL, Next.js 15, TypeScript, Apollo Client, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, PostgreSQL, Docker, GitHub Actions, CI/CD, DigitalOcean
tattoo.description: Full-stack platform for tattoo studio management with client booking, portfolio management, and artist scheduling. Built with modern GraphQL architecture, featuring responsive design and comprehensive admin functionality. Includes separate backend (NestJS) and frontend (Next.js) repositories with Docker containerization, CI/CD pipelines, and deployed on DigitalOcean.
items: Developed GraphQL API with NestJS and Prisma ORM
Built responsive frontend with Next.js 15 and Tailwind CSS
Implemented Docker containerization for deployment
Configured CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions
Created admin panel with shadcn/ui components
Implemented authentication and authorization systems

matchio.name: Matchio
matchio.description: Large SaaS platform for automating program selection processes. The service allows flexible configuration of conditions for candidates and hosts, with automatic matching based on custom algorithms. Includes a designer for creating forms, tables, and setting up approval sequences for documents and files.
items: Implementation of core functionality and features
Code maintenance and optimization
Program setup and configuration

intraveler.name: Intraveler
intraveler.description: International travel and volunteer platform for young people. Helps users find, book and manage trips that combine adventure, cultural exchange and work on social and environmental projects.
items: Communication with customers and development team
Developed and maintained multiple admin panels for content, users, and bookings management
Integrated Stripe payment system for online transactions
Designed and implemented RESTful API for stable data exchange

remoteworx.name: RemoteWorx
remoteworx.description: Remote work platform designed to support employee well-being. Promotes healthy habits like proper nutrition and exercise, featuring a gamified module to help users enhance their remote workspace.
items: Created and implemented user interface components
Collaborated closely with designers and back-end developers
Developed adaptive game to attract employees to the site
Built in-game store and refined game mechanics to increase engagement

cwhub.name: CW Hub
cwhub.description: Full-stack web application for managing employees' working hours, weekends, public holidays, and vacations, including a calendar interface and leave request system.
items: Full-stack development (front-end & back-end)
Implemented calendar for tracking working days, weekends, and holidays
Built functionality for vacation planning, requests, and approvals
Developed logic for time tracking and reporting

intern.name: Intern Project
intern.description: Web application that allowed users to request watch repair services by booking available masters, taking into account their workload and schedules.
items: Developed web application from scratch
Ensured correct functionality and responsive UI across devices
Set up build and deployment process and published the site

education.title: EDUCATION
education.school: Prydniprovska State Academy of Civil Engineering and Architecture
education.details: Specialized in Civil Engineering with focus on structural design, construction management, and architectural planning. Completed comprehensive coursework in engineering principles, mathematics, and project management.

technologies.title: TECHNOLOGIES
technologies.frontendList: React, React Router, Redux Toolkit, Material UI, Styled Components, Tailwind CSS, Formik, React Hook Form, HTML5, CSS3
technologies.backendList: Node.js, NestJS, Express.js, GraphQL (Apollo), REST API
technologies.toolsList: Git, GitHub, Docker, GitHub Actions, CI/CD, Postman, Swagger, Webpack
